title: The only fear is that you wasted your money
review: This is the biggest hoax since some forgotten fake snuff film I watched 25 years ago. It could have been made in a couple weekends with a three-figure budget.  The only thing that kept me from walking out is I kept thinking it would get better: it didn't.

title: Only found one laugh in the whole movie. Other th...
review: Only found one laugh in the whole movie.  Other than the canine, didn't see much to enjoy.  Did like the Matt Dillon character.
